Lots of fun, but very rage inducing!

You WILL play a lot of cheaters when you first start. Even if you buy prime your trust factor will be bad and you'll go against a lot of cheaters. Just push through it, if you build up a good trust factor the game gets a LOT better (but its still not perfect). 

If you loathe cheaters, go buy faceit, its really worth it.

EDIT: I change my mind this game sucks balls

EDIT 2: My mind has not changed in the additional 116 hours I have played

EDIT 3: CSGO has a big problem with the ranking system. It plays well functionally but smurfing and hackers are rampant and pretty much kill the experience for the average player. Its not uncommon to be queued against a team where multiple players have 4000+ hours of playtime in silver. 

I cannot dissuade potential players enough
